meanings.sent1: The beekeepers collected honey from the hives.
meanings.sent2: Many beekeepers wear protective gear when working with bees.
meanings.sent3: The beekeepers joked that the bees were giving them a buzz.
meanings.sent4: The beekeepers were like guardians of the buzzing kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The beekeepers' dedication to their bees was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Those who tend to and care for bee colonies.
meanings.sent1: The beekeepers inspected the hives for any signs of disease.
meanings.sent2: Beekeepers play a crucial role in maintaining the health of bee populations.
meanings.sent3: The beekeepers organized a bee-themed party for their friends.
meanings.sent4: The beekeepers nurtured the colonies like precious gardens.
meanings.sent5: The beekeepers' love for their bees shone through in their every action.
